name:
We offer superb four star accommodation at affordable prices. We have a choice of spacious ensuite rooms as well as suites that offer the versatility of having kitchenettes and living areas. We also provide free Wi-Fi and free parking for all guests.
 
Our Valley Bar is a popular spot for locals and visitors alike, and the perfect place to enjoy a relaxing drink or a wholesome meal after a day exploring Killarneyâs great outdoors.
